page.title: 02Middlefield Hospital
page.content: Middlefield is a{hospital}for mentally handicapped people operating within the National{Health}Service .There are 165 patients who are from all parts of the country-only 4 are local people. Each resident is recommended for admission in the first place by the family doctor. Entries have now ceased and the hospital is due for closure in about 15 years.It is hoped that patients will be trained to take their place in the community and flats are being built to cater for them.Many{patients have spent most of their lives there (the longest resident having been there for 62 years) and will require extensive training to be able to return to society.
